comment: : Trocadero square in Paris evacuated. Policemen pointing their gun. via
amr:
# ::snt : Trocadero square in Paris evacuated. Policemen pointing their gun. via
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (e / evacuate-01
            :ARG1 (s / square
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Trocadero")
                  :location (c / city
                        :name (n2 / name
                              :op1 "Paris"))))
      :snt2 (p / point-01
            :ARG0 (p2 / policeman)
            :ARG1 (g / gun
                  :poss p2))
      :snt3 (v / via))

comment: Has the civil war in Europe started already?
amr:
# ::snt Has the civil war in Europe started already?
(s / start-01
      :ARG1 (w / war
            :mod (c / civil)
            :location (c2 / continent
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Europe")))
      :time (a / already)
      :polarity (a2 / amr-unknown))
